column4: during one of those synaptic manager installations my CPU shut down. This as resulted in a some 5 packages getting corrupted or something.. After installation i get this message that tese packages culd not be installed.. is there any way to rest the apt\?
often you can use dpkg to remove the bad packages.. or reinstall them if they are vital
dpkg is a bit more.. how to put it.. stable, when it comes to bad stuff
